parameters.query: SELECT pm.*, im.purchase_price, ao.aeo_score, ao.json_ld_product as existing_json_ld, lg.calculated_price_usd as ebay_price FROM products_master pm LEFT JOIN inventory_master im ON pm.id = im.product_id LEFT JOIN aeo_optimization ao ON pm.id = ao.product_id LEFT JOIN listing_gateway lg ON pm.id = lg.product_id AND lg.dest_platform = 'ebay' WHERE pm.status = 'active' AND ($1::integer IS NULL OR pm.id = $1) ORDER BY pm.updated_at DESC LIMIT 50

INSERT INTO shopify_aeo_data (product_id, competitor_prices, price_advantage_percent, price_advantage_text, condition_grade, condition_details, json_ld_product, json_ld_offer, aeo_completeness_score, aeo_freshness_score, aeo_trust_score, aeo_total_score, sync_status) VALUES ($1, $2::jsonb, $3, $4, $5, $6, $7::jsonb, $8::jsonb, $9, $10, $11, $12, 'pending') ON CONFLICT (product_id) DO UPDATE SET competitor_prices = $2::jsonb, price_advantage_percent = $3, price_advantage_text = $4, condition_grade = $5, condition_details = $6, json_ld_product = $7::jsonb, json_ld_offer = $8::jsonb, aeo_completeness_score = $9, aeo_freshness_score = $10, aeo_trust_score = $11, aeo_total_score = $12, sync_status = 'pending', updated_at = NOW() RETURNING id

parameters.jsonBody: ={{ JSON.stringify({ metafield: { namespace: 'aeo', key: 'structured_data', value: JSON.stringify($node['ðŸŽ¯ AEOè¨ˆç®—'].json.json_ld_product), type: 'json' } }) }}

parameters.query: UPDATE shopify_aeo_data SET sync_status = 'synced', last_synced_to_shopify = NOW() WHERE product_id = $1
